title: Discussions underway over online schooling for students
body_lines: A special discussion is being held at the Education Ministry today regarding the continuation of school activities due to the current situation.
The main decision to be taken is whether the school education will be conducted online or not.
Meanwhile, the Education Minister said that a decision will be taken to conduct studies in rural schools without transport problems.
Educational authorities in charge of provincial, zonal and divisional as well as trade union members are expected to participate in this discussion. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
